review_title: Not a good experience after CHS  (Corporate) took over!
job_title: Clerk -looking for A Better Job in Tomball, TX
pros: Other employees are nice, because they can relate... The new people are nice because they don't know anything different.
cons:
Corporate Management, it's all about the dollar.. They promote caring .. but I do not sense that they really do not care, especially to the employees.  The nurses are expected to cover more patients and complete their documentation before the shift ends.. Hard to spend much quality time with the patient.  
To acknowledge the employees, they sometime will give them a candy bar "woof woof".. " Good dogie!" Yeah I feel the love that corporate brings to the table.$$$
The food in the cafeteria is less than desirable and way more expensive. No more breaks, half hour lunch .. That is it!
Did eat dog world here now. Sad!

job_title: Diagnostic Medical Sonographer in Tomball, TX
pros: Great co-workers! Great physicians! Growing community.
cons: Tomball on the whole wasn’t bad, however HCA is. Horrible EMR, Poor PTO accrual, No paid Holliday’s , No sick pay, Comparatively low wages, management doesn’t care about the ground level employees ( nurses,MAs,LVNs, Techs). They do care about numbers. Gone downhill since HCA buyout. Often worked short staffed in one area or another.

pros: I enjoy patient care. I have the ability to make people smile and im a very hard worker. I love taking care of others. Saving one person at a time..
cons: Sometimes having 12-16 patients at a time can be a bit overwhelming. However, with a possitive attitude i manage to win their hearts.

pros: Everyone is friendly and nurses are great to work with.
cons: Work you hard for little money
